features.title: Isolated cloud execution
features.description: Every task runs in an ephemeral Fly Machine, so engineers avoid local setup drift and teams get consistent runtime behavior.

features.title: Multi-agent orchestration
features.description: Route the same issue workflow through Opencode, Claude, or Amp without changing your developer surface area in GitHub.

features.title: User-owned configuration
features.description: Keep credentials and defaults in private GitHub Gists, preserving user ownership while enabling secure runtime injection.

features.title: Transparent cost model
features.description: Porter adds no hidden platform tax: you pay only for machine time and model tokens consumed by actual tasks.
